citation.text: 8 The relevant principles were correctly applied by the learned Federal Magistrate. That is to say, he directed himself in accordance with the well-known test in Wren v Mahony [1972] HCA 5 ; (1972) 126 CLR 212 at 224 and 225 and also at 236. Reliance was also placed by the Federal Magistrate on the Full Court decision of this Court in Wolff v Donovan (1991) 29 FCR 480 at 481 and again at 486.

8 The relevant principles were correctly applied by the learned Federal Magistrate. That is to say, he directed himself in accordance with the well-known test in Wren v Mahony [1972] HCA 5 ; (1972) 126 CLR 212 at 224 and 225 and also at 236. Reliance was also placed by the Federal Magistrate on the Full Court decision of this Court in Wolff v Donovan (1991) 29 FCR 480 at 481 and again at 486.
